data.name: 西州镇魂曲
data.detailed_description:
Xizhou town soul song is a simple role-playing game. Players will play Xiashi and go down the mountain to subdue demons and demons.

On the way of China's entry into WTO, through the experience of Xizhou, we gradually have a deeper understanding of the world Tao and constantly explore the Tao we pursue.



Combat system

In the game, the action shooting method will be used to restore the sword light and sword shadow of the fairyland and fight magic soldiers.

In addition to the action of elite shooting, you may also add some elements of flying and shooting in addition to the role of elite shooting.



Big world

The game will adopt the form of large map grid, and different events and playing methods may appear randomly in each grid area.

For players to explore and play.



plot

There will be a clear main line in the game. The plot revolves around some things that happen in Xizhou. By tracking the clues of demon clan and ghost resentment, we can cut off demons and eliminate demons, and gradually find our own way at the same time.



Overall

This is a small role-playing game based on the main plot and the combination of action shooting and combat. At present, it is in the early concept stage. Please pay more attention to Qingquan studio.
